titles.title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to provide for special pay for psychologists in the commissioned corps of the Public Health Service.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Federal Services, Post Office.

committee.subcommittee: Federal Services, Post Office, and Civil Service
committee.name: Senate Governmental Affairs

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends Federal law to provide for special pay for psychologists in the commissioned corps of the Public Health Service Corps. Sets forth the rates of such special pay.
